website_summaries.verdict: You can count on this high quality steel mount to safely keep your Nintendo Switch on the wall.
pros: The HIDEit wall mount is made from a sturdy steel material
The included screws and anchors ensure this reliable wall mount will keep your console safe and secure
HIDEit is designed to fit the Switch perfectly, not too loose or too tight
The minimalist design allows for easy, slide out access to the Switch at any time
cons: Mounts flat against the wall, which doesn't allow for much ventilation

customer_reviews.title: Skip it.
customer_reviews.text: Mine is either bent or it's just a bad product. It doesn't fit snug at all. As you can see in the pic it's leaning forward.(the second pic is how it should look. Alas my finger can't stay there..) I thought about taking it down and bending it but that's ridiculous imo. I'd contact the seller but amazon makes it impossible to do that. I'll be returning it sadly. Was looking forward to getting it out of its slot between the Xbox and ps4.
customer_reviews.author: C0SM0 SIX5

customer_reviews.title: HIDEit mounts - simple and clean!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say here. It's metal bent to exact specifications to hang your gear on the wall. If it seems I am simplifying it...then you get the message. It comes with the screws and anchors you need so no need for an extra trip to the store. I have Nintendo switch and Xbox one s mounts and now I have the clean look I was aiming for. Made in USA - awesome - wish you could add a 6th star for products made in the USA. Very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: teege

customer_reviews.title: Good mount with a minor flaw.
customer_reviews.text: This a pretty high quality product. It fits the Switch and all cables perfectly. The only negative I have is that when you have a cord plugged in on the side of the Switch on the open side of the mount it pulls the Switch out if it's tugged at all. This is easy enough to fix if you plan to just leave the dock in the mount. Overall it serves the purpose and the mounting is very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Williams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Design
customer_reviews.text: Prior to this mount, I was using the total mount, which I was not happy with. As you can see in my included photos, I have a nice skin that I placed over my Switch to give it a more retro look. This mount allows the new design of my switch to stand out proudly and is so simple looking that it almost looks as if the Switch is floating! It's perfect, I've used other HIDEit mounts for my other things, and I'm convinced now that no other company does it best!
customer_reviews.author: uBetchya

customer_reviews.title: very easy to install and love it
customer_reviews.text: i love it now i just have to get the item to hide the wires the other pics is what i had that i got from Lowe's they hold 100 lbs i say its over kill for this but i deside it to use it but if you don't have a stud to go into you can use these to be safe that's if you used like the Ps4 or x Xbox but i love the Hideit mount will be buy the the Xbox and the Ps4 now they just need to make a universal mount for computer mount
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Kubida

customer_reviews.title: Great for a clean looking install.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this behind my television set as I like having a clean install with no wires or components visible. Install was a breeze, and now my Switch is completely hidden behind the upper left corner of my TV (which is hung on a full motion mount). Undocking the Switch is no problem, and the design of the mount does not obstruct cooling or ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wall mount for Nintendo Switch
customer_reviews.text: Great mount for the Nintendo Switch. Helps keeping it off the table. It looks neat and amazing mounted. Nobody is gonna knock it down so it can fall.
customer_reviews.author: vdn34a

customer_reviews.title: Decent mount for the price. Seems very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install. The only thing I didnt like was that were were several holes to screw though on the mount but it didn’t really say which ones to use. There was an older video online that showed a different model. Also it it just slides in and out which I’m nervous it could slide out with my headphones attached to it if it got yanked. I wish it clipped in or something.
customer_reviews.author: maxtimebomb

customer_reviews.title: Stop your search!! This is it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 Switch dock mounts (one for my son's room) and wow I wish I had gotten this one for his room instead! You can easily reroute the direction of the cables with this mount and the cables become easy to conceal from the left side. Absolutely seamless. This this mount!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrabot

customer_reviews.title: A great option to get the switch up and off of the floor.
customer_reviews.text: A good option to get your Switch up and off of the floor and on to the wall. I have other HIDEit mounts, so I decided to purchase this one as well. My biggest gripe is that it is kind-of loose in the mount - just doesn't feel as secure as some of their other mounts. Other than that, it's what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt get better!!!
customer_reviews.text: The HIDEit mount for the Nintendo Switch just makes sense. It's small, mounts with two screws, and could hold more than ten times the weight that it needs to. I had this mount up in just a couple minutes with it's hardware all included. This turned the office into a classy game room and what was a messy console into fabulous wall art! #afterHIDEit
customer_reviews.author: Devin Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Controllers suffer connection issue when mounted behind TV
customer_reviews.text: While it does work to conceal the Nintendo Switch, my couch is 12 feet away from my TV and with it mounted behind the TV it suffers from connection issues. I will need to mount it in a line of site which defeats the purpose of "Hide it". Also while it may be more ideal for the play station, you need to really reach around your TV to be able to dock and un-dock the Switch.
customer_reviews.author: Mekrabb

customer_reviews.title: Works well but instructions were vague
customer_reviews.text: We like it but the mount like our Switch a little lopsided. Not sure what the issue is but overall happy and it leans so slightly that we can overlook it since it's nice just being able to have our Switch wall mounted.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Mount
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 mounts from this company, one for the Xbox 1 X, one for the PlayStation 4 (got the wrong size), and the Switch. These things are so AWESOME!!!! Such a great alternative to paying someone hundreds of dollars to come make electrical outlets and hide wires behind walls (trust me I did my research). They look so good mounted and although we aren’t done yet, it makes it easy to hide the wires as well.
customer_reviews.author: B. Norman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Behind Wall Mounted TV's
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I have mine behind a wall mounted TV so this stays hidden and everything looks super clean with no wires showing. I took mini zip ties and rolled the excess cables up behind the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan W.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! securely holds the switch and makes my room tidy (as tidy as we can with a 6 month old). It would be better if it had a hook for my controllers but is definitely worth it if you want to clean up your tv area and had a good system to hide the wires.
customer_reviews.author: BN.

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great & High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This wall mint fits my Nintendo Switch perfectly. I also like that the black finish matches the Switch very well. The unit is very well built and came with the mounting hardware. I’m very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks great 👍 , Very sturdy . Taking the switch on and off the mount can be done without any effort . Buying a second mount for another switch we have in another room

customer_reviews.text: Install was super easy, the mount itself seems of decent quality... but I'm taking a star off since the fit leaves a bit of wiggle, it's not as snug as the PS4 version.

customer_reviews.text: This is mounted on the wall behind the TV and holds the Switch dock perfectly. Make sure you attach it to the wall with a level.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for and looks awesome. I just finished building a wall for my TV/fire place and this mount is just perfect to hide the Nintendo on the side.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy install, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Simple, clean, and keeps clutter off the top of my desk. Very easy to install - just two screws (and optional drywall anchors if you're not screwing one of the screws into a stud). All in all took about 5 minutes to get hung up. Now I have more open space on my desk again and my Switch looks like it's on display on the wall.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mounting behind a wall mounted TV.
customer_reviews.text: This hides my switch perfectly behind my wall mounted tv without showing any wires. I have two more consoles I will likely be mounting. This company makes a great product. Great job.

customer_reviews.title: The best accessory for your switch, bar none!
customer_reviews.text: Received my HIDEit switch mount in 2 days. The weight and material is confidence inspiring; I know my Nintendo switch console is perfectly cradled securely and snugly on the wall and won't fall. All the hardware was included and made for an easy installation. If you have a Nintendo switch I highly recommend this product. It's the perfect accessory for your console.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!

It is made of a heavy metal, very strong and sturdy. I will continue to buy more HIDEit products for sure. My other HIDEit mount was for my PS4 and I’ve had that one for over 3 years going strong, no issues.

Thank you so much for this affordable, and well-built, solution to keep things off my desk!

product_meta.title: HIDEit Switch - Nintendo Switch Wall Mount - Mount for Nintendo Switch (Black) - HIDEit Behind the TV or DISPLAYit - Made in the USA and Trusted Worldwide Since 2009 - Search afterHIDEit on Social
feature_bullets: WALL MOUNT FOR CONVENIENT ACCESS. With the HIDEit Nintendo Switch Mount you can wall mount your Nintendo Switch console behind the TV or DISPLAYit for a sleek gaming setup!

CUSTOM MOUNT DESIGN. Designed specifically for the Nintendo Switch Dock, the HIDEit Nintendo Switch Wall Mount provides easy access to the Nintendo Switch and Dock. Our mount secures the Switch in place and the tab prevents the Nintendo Switch Dock from sliding.

DESIGNED FOR MAXIMUM VENTILATION. The offset design of our Switch Mount ensures maximum airflow and the cutouts on our Switch Wall Mount align with the vents on the Nintendo Switch, so overheating isn’t an issue.

STEEL FOR ULTIMATE STRENGTH. Like your TV Mount, the HIDEit Switch Mount is made from heavy-gauge, cold-rolled steel for strength you can trust. Powder-coat finish won't rust or chip and protects the Switch from scratches.

INSTALLit IN JUST 3 EASY STEPS. No complicated templates. Drill not required. Stud mounting optional. Includes flat head drywall screws, drywall anchors rated for 25 pounds each, M4 and M6 VESA screws.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars315 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
